api_list.name: Get Slip Data From Image
api_list.description:
Required an image of bank slip upload through our API as `file` to be able to obtain information regarding transaction.

![Bank Slip Collection](https://ik.imagekit.io/codustry/jingdi/bank_slip_collection_AJURuIY2raX.png?updatedAt=1633547344848)

required_parameters.name: file
required_parameters.description: Type` string <binary> (File)` , upload an image of bank slip with QR

api_list.name: Get Slip Data from QR code
api_list.description:
Required an image of QR code upload through our API as `file`  to be able to obtain information regarding transaction.

![QR Code](https://ik.imagekit.io/codustry/jingdi/QR_code_qC0lWkNlA.png?updatedAt=1633548965020)

api_list.name: Get Slip Data from Transaction Reference
api_list.description:
Required `sending_bank_id `and `transaction_ref_id ` requested through our API to be able to obtain information regarding transaction.

![QR Data Extraction](https://ik.imagekit.io/codustry/jingdi/QR_data_extraction_Jp0ClbILH.png?updatedAt=1633548018315)
